搞.definition: to do; to make; to go in for; to set up; to get hold of; to take care of

搞亂.definition: to mess up; to mismanage; to bungle; to confuse; to muddle

搞基.definition: (slang) to engage in male homosexual practices

搞好.definition: to do well at; to do a good job

搞定.definition: to fix; to settle; to wangle

搞怪.definition: to do sth wacky; wacky; wacky behavior

搞毛.definition: (dialect) what are you doing?; what the hell?

搞活.definition: to enliven; to invigorate; to revitalize

搞混.definition: to confuse; to muddle; to mix up

搞砸.definition: to mess (sth) up; to foul up; to spoil

搞笑.definition: to get people to laugh; funny; hilarious

搞花樣.definition: to play tricks; to cheat; to deceive

搞花樣兒.definition: erhua variant of 搞花樣|搞花样[gao3 hua1 yang4]

搞錯.definition: mistake; to make a mistake; to blunder; mistaken

搞頭.definition: (coll.) likelihood of being worthwhile; cf. 有搞頭|有搞头[you3 gao3 tou5] and 沒搞頭|没搞头[mei2 gao3 tou5]

搞鬼.definition: to make mischief; to play tricks
